subject: [Radiance-general] BSDF file for light redirecting film
body:
Dear Chris,

The files used by Basurto in her thesis (
http://dx.doi.org/10.5075/epfl-thesis-6425) were monitored using EPFL's
gonio-photometer. We had the manufacturers providing samples that we
measured.

Hope this helps,
Best,
Jerome

Dr J?r?me KAEMPF
<jk at kaemco.ch>
*[image: EPFL] <http://people.epfl.ch/kaempf> *// team leader *urban
systems simulation*
[image: kaemco] <http://www.kaemco.ch> // founder and managing partner

[image: bandeau_email_encadre] <http://cisbat.org/>

2015-01-15 19:08 GMT+01:00 Chris Coulter <Chris.Coulter at burohappold.com>:
